amendment.description: To establish a subcommittee to coordinate and facilitate United States leadership in high-energy physics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2151) To establish a subcommittee to coordinate and facilitate United States leadership in high-energy physics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3239 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3239 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 2953.
